alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Holmes; Morrow; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 9:23PM EDT until June 15 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in north central Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Northeastern Morrow County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Crawford County in north central Ohio... Southwestern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Northwestern Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 922 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Polk to Shelby to 6 miles east of Bucyrus, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Bucyrus, Galion, Shelby, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, Loudonville, Bellville, Shreve, Hayesville, Polk, Nashville, Butler, Perrysville, Lucas, Jeromesville, North Robinson and Mifflin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Crawford; Holmes; Morrow; Richland; Wayne
